about_the_game:
You control a Cyber Seeker.

Cyber Seekers are bots used to complete high-risk bounties. You are tasked with destroying a legion of bots who have gone rogue and taken over a city. Start every run with limited resources. Receive credits for each bot you destroy and use them to upgrade your bot.

Explore the Docks

In this demo, you will be deployed to the docks. Explore the area to find multiple challenges. Completing these would reduce the bot presence and reward you with Credits and Schematics. Use these to upgrade your bot. Destroying bots increases the alert level and gives you access to high-level crates that have powerful weapons. Be wary; the bots will also double down on their efforts to stop you.

Experience RogueLite features

Each time your bot gets destroyed, the alert level is reset, and it loses all the weapons and any items bought through credits. It will, however, retain the Schematics and core upgrades. Use these to make your bot more powerful each run. Weapons in crates have random traits, making them unique in each playthrough. 

Note: This demo includes a static level that does not have random encounters or level changes on each run.

name: Cyber Seekers: Conquest Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160, 3.6 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Shoot, strike and hack machines in a rogue lite sci-fi adventure. Run on walls and use your grapple gun to explore the docks area and find unique weapons. Your task is simple: destroy other bots that have conquered the area and reduce their presence.
